title: 37th Floor unit!!  Awesome view of downtown!
posting_body: Text ID #5263A to my cell for more info!
The Art of LivingAre you ready to live life at the next level?
We are the newest luxury high-rise in downtown Austin and reaches new heights in high-rise living while offering modern finishes and upscale amenities.
As a resident, you will have easy access to Trader Joe’s, Whole Foods Market, an array of restaurants, entertainment and shopping in the 2nd Street District.

You can enjoy a movie or check out The Moody Theater for local and national acts, or make your way down to the hike and bike trail with your furry friends within minutes of your home!You’ll love the stunning panoramic views of Hill Country, Lady Bird Lake and the city from our Lakeview Lounge.
Austin is a booming city and you can enjoy year-round festivals and events such as SXSW, Austin City Limits and our local downtown Farmer’s Market.
Come home to your own personal retreat at Northshore.
Our high-rise apartment homes offer one, two, three-bedrooms and Penthouses floorplans with a fantastic array of community and living features, sure to make you feel completely at home.
Our 24-hour concierge will welcome you and your guests as you enter our beautiful Silver level LEED building.

Concierge is there to make your life easier and can assist you with nearly anything you need – after all you’re our focus!You’ll also enjoy a host of high-tech features, including three conference rooms, Media Room with Cinema-Style Seating, Private Lounges, iMac Business Center, an elite Technogym fitness club, car charging stations, and controlled-access parking garage with options for reserved and private garages.

Check out our gallery, then contact us and for a personalized tour of our community!Our beautifully landscaped and spacious pool deck features resort-style cabanas, sun beds, multiple grill stations, outdoor fire pit and fireplace with plenty of seating.
When you’re ready to call it a day, your stylish home will comfort you and your furry friends.

We offer custom finishes such as premium slab granite and quartz countertops, engineered hardwood floors and floor-to-ceiling windows to give our units a lavish look, with deep walk-in closets, spa-inspired bathrooms, and stunning terraces which offer a sophisticated living experience.
